generalized_time.description: Datetime possibly with timezone calculations. Precise to the milliseconds.

binary_time.description: Datetime based on epoch or 1984. Date and time after midnight are stored separately. Precise to the second.

utc_time.description: Datetime based on epoch. Precise to the microseconds.
